name: Wrongbix Cube
description:
Imagine a rubix's cube. Now imagine that same cube but you can no longer even begin to comprehend it at as a cube. This was a mistake, but it is my mistake.

How To Play:

This game uses exclusively the mouse

Use the remote in the bottom right of the screen to rotate the cube, each of the colored buttons will rotate that colors face clockwise one rotation. (the buttons show the color when they are hovered over with the mouse)

The mix key shuffles the cube

The reset key solves it

The view key changes the view.

Good luck
